hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"I said to Bilal: 'How did the Prophet (S) reply to them when they gave him Salams and he was performing Salat?' He said: 'He would motion with his hand

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِشَارَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Making Signals During Salat
